author: abc
post_text: February 6, 2023 at 10:19 PM#1Hello 1 have 15 group master on 15 fader .It is possible to use a command to assign the Negative mode to the 15 group master ?Thank's

posts.author: abc
posts.post_text: February 6, 2023 at 10:19 PM#1Hello 1 have 15 group master on 15 fader .It is possible to use a command to assign the Negative mode to the 15 group master ?Thank's

posts.author: Duplicate MarkvanderMeulen
posts.post_text: February 21, 2023 at 8:17 PM#2Hi ABC,Try this:[color=#00FF00]Assign Executor A.B thru C.D/mode=negative[/color]Where A and C stand for pagenumbers and B and D for executornumbersFor Positive mode use:[color=#00FF00]Assign Executor A.B thru C.D/mode=positive[/color]And for Additive mode use:[color=#00FF00]Assign Executor A.B thru C.D/mode=additive[/color]

title: assign function to several group master
